changeSet.sql: update usm_constant set item_value='{"label":"AI Brain","icon":"assets/icons/digital-ai-brain.svg","children":[{"label":"Datasources","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/datasources","children":[],"_id":2},{"label":"Data Market Place","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/datasets","children":[],"_id":3},{"label":"Analytics Pipelines","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/pipelines","children":[],"_id":4},{"label":"Workflows","icon":"","url":"./workflows/create/specification","children":[{"label":"Volume Forecast","icon":"","url":"./workflows/VolumeForecast","children":[],"_id":6},{"label":"EASE","icon":"","url":"./workflows/EASE","children":[],"_id":7},{"label":"Ticket Clustering","icon":"","url":"./workflows/TicketClustering","_id":8},{"label":"Shift Roster","icon":"","url":"./workflows/ShiftRoster","children":[],"_id":18}],"_id":5},{"label":"Model Market Place","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/models","children":[],"_id":9},{"label":"Agents","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/agents","children":[],"_id":10},{"label":"Data Models","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/schemas","children":[{"label":"Schemas","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/schemas","children":[],"_id":12},{"label":"Relationships","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/schemas/relationship","children":[],"_id":13}],"_id":11},{"label":"Events","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/events","children":[],"_id":14},{"label":"Chains","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/jobs/chain","children":[],"_id":15},{"label":"Schedule","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/jobs/scheduled","children":[],"_id":16},{"label":"Logs","icon":"","url":"./aibrain/jobs/logs","children":[],"_id":17}],"horizontal":true}' where item='IT Portfolio Manager Side' and project_name='leo1311' and item_value LIKE '%AI Brain%';
